front.title: The Text/HTML content type and the Content-Location MIME header or Sending HTML documents via MIME e-mail

abstract.t: This memo specifies how to send HTML-formatted documents in Internet mail. The memo particularly addresses the issue of handling of hyperlinks in HTML documents referring to embedded content in other body parts in the same message. In order to do this, the memo introduces one new MIME content-header with the name 'Content-Location'.
